title: Payment Interface
description:
Create:
1. Interface Payable with method: double calculatePayment()
2. Class Employee implementing Payable with: double salary field, constructor,
   calculatePayment() returning salary
3. Class Contractor implementing Payable with: double hourlyRate, int hoursWorked,
   constructor, calculatePayment() returning hourlyRate * hoursWorked
